00074 
00075 // identical to charge radius squared (modulo factor Z)
00076 
00077 static void ob_emonopole(const SlaterDet* Q,
00078                          const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00079                          const GaussianAux* X, complex double *emonopole)
00080 {
00081   complex double mr2;
00082   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z;
00083 
00084   mr2 = (3.0*X->alpha + X->rho2)* X->Q;
00085  
00086   *emonopole += (1.0*Z/(A*A) + (1+G1->xi)/2 *(1.0-2.0/A))* mr2;
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 static void tb_emonopole(const SlaterDet* Q,
00091                          const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00092                          const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00093                          const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00094                          complex double *emonopole)
00095 {       
00096   complex double mr2;
00097   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z;
00098 
00099   mr2 = cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)*X13->Q*X24->Q;
00100 
00101   *emonopole +=  2.0*(1.0*Z/(A*A) - 
00102                       ((1+G1->xi)/2+(1+G2->xi)/2) *1.0/A)* mr2;
00103 }
00104 
00105 
00106 static void ob_edipole(const SlaterDet* Q,
00107                        const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2,
00108                        const GaussianAux* X, complex double ed[3])
00109 {
00110   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z;
00111   double M = Z*mproton+(A-Z)*mneutron;
00112   int i;
00113 
00114   for (i=0; i<3; i++)   
00115     ed[i] += ((1+G1->xi)/2 - Z*mass(G1->xi)/M)* X->rho[i]* X->Q;
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 static void ob_mdipole(const SlaterDet* Q,
00120                        const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00121                        const GaussianAux* X, complex double m[3])
00122 {
00123   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z;
00124   complex double muspin[3], muorbital[3];
00125   int i;
00126 
00127   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00128     muspin[i] = X->T*((1+G1->xi)/2*muproton + (1-G1->xi)/2*muneutron)*
00129       X->sig[i]*X->R;
00130   
00131   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00132     muorbital[i] = ((1+G1->xi)/2*(1.0-2.0/A)+1.0*Z/(A*A))* X->rhoxpi[i]* X->Q;
00133         
00134   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00135     m[i] += muspin[i] + muorbital[i]; 
00136 }
00137 
00138 
00139 static void tb_mdipole(const SlaterDet* Q,
00140                        const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00141                        const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00142                        const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00143                        complex double m[3])
00144 {
00145   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z;
00146   int i;
00147 
00148   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00149     m[i] += 2*(-((1+G1->xi)/2+(1+G2->xi)/2)*1.0/A + 1.0*Z/(A*A))*
00150       (X13->rho[(i+1)%3]*X24->pi[(i+2)%3]-X13->rho[(i+2)%3]*X24->pi[(i+1)%3])*
00151       X13->Q* X24->Q;
00152 }
00153 
00154 
00155 static void ob_equadrupole(const SlaterDet* Q,
00156                            const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00157                            const GaussianAux* X, 
00158                            complex double q[9])
00159 {
00160   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z;
00161   int i,j;
00162 
00163   for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00164     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00165       q[i+j*3] += ((1.0-2.0/A)*(1+G1->xi)/2 + 1.0*Z/(A*A))*
00166         X->rho[i]*X->rho[j]*X->Q;
00167 
00168     // q[j+j*3] += - 1.0/3.0* ((1.0-2.0/A)*(1+G1->xi)/2 + 1.0*Z/(A*A))*
00169     //  X->rho2* X->Q; 
00170   }
00171 }
00172 
00173 
00174 static void tb_equadrupole(const SlaterDet* Q,
00175                            const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00176                            const Gaussian* G3, const Gaussian* G4, 
00177                            const GaussianAux* X13, const GaussianAux* X24, 
00178                            complex double q[9])
00179 {
00180   int A=Q->A, Z=Q->Z;
00181   int i,j;
00182 
00183   for (j=0; j<3; j++) {
00184     for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00185       q[i+j*3] += (-2.0/A*(1+G1->xi)/2 + 1.0*Z/(A*A))*
00186         (X13->rho[i]*X24->rho[j]+X13->rho[j]*X24->rho[i])* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00187 
00188     //  q[j+j*3] += -2.0/3.0* (-2.0/A*(1+G1->xi)/2 + 1.0*Z/(A*A))* 
00189     //  cvec3mult(X13->rho, X24->rho)* X13->Q* X24->Q;
00190   }
00191 }

00193 
00194 void calcEMonopoleod(void* Par,
00195                      const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00196                      const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00197                      complex double* emonopole)
00198 {
00199   complex double emonoone, emonotwo;
00200 
00201   OneBodyOperator op_ob_emono = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_emonopole};
00202   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_emono = {dim: 1, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_emonopole};
00203 
00204   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_emono, &emonoone);
00205   calcSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_tb_emono, &emonotwo);
00206 
00207   *emonopole = emonoone + emonotwo;
00208 }
00209 
00210 
00211 void calcEDipoleod(void* Par,
00212                    const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00213                    const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00214                    complex double edipole[3])
00215 {
00216   complex double ed[3];
00217 
00218   OneBodyOperator op_ob_edipole = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_edipole};
00219 
00220   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_edipole, ed);
00221 
00222   // spherical components -1, 0, +1
00223   edipole[0] =   0.5*sqrt(1.5/M_PI)*(ed[0] - I*ed[1]);
00224   edipole[1] =   0.5*sqrt(3.0/M_PI)*(ed[2]);
00225   edipole[2] = - 0.5*sqrt(1.5/M_PI)*(ed[0] + I*ed[1]);
00226 }
00227 
00228 
00229 
00230 void calcMDipoleod(void* Par,
00231                    const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00232                    const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00233                    complex double mdipole[3])
00234 {
00235   complex double mone[3], mtwo[3], m[3];
00236   int i;
00237 
00238   OneBodyOperator op_ob_mdi = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_mdipole};
00239   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_mdi = {dim: 3, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_mdipole};
00240 
00241   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_mdi, mone);
00242   calcSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_tb_mdi, mtwo);
00243 
00244   for (i=0; i<3; i++)
00245     m[i] = mone[i] + mtwo[i];
00246 
00247   // spherical components -1, 0, +1
00248   mdipole[0] =   0.5*sqrt(1.5/M_PI)*(m[0] - I*m[1]);
00249   mdipole[1] =   0.5*sqrt(3.0/M_PI)*(m[2]);
00250   mdipole[2] = - 0.5*sqrt(1.5/M_PI)*(m[0] + I*m[1]);
00251 }
00252 
00253 
00254 void calcEQuadrupoleod(void* Par,
00255                        const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00256                        const SlaterDetAux* X, 
00257                        complex double equadrupole[5])
00258 {
00259   complex double qone[9], qtwo[9], q[9];
00260   int i;
00261 
00262   OneBodyOperator op_ob_equad = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Q, me: ob_equadrupole};
00263   TwoBodyOperator op_tb_equad = {dim: 9, opt: 1, par: Q, me: tb_equadrupole};
00264 
00265   calcSlaterDetOBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_ob_equad, qone);
00266   calcSlaterDetTBMEod(Q, Qp, X, &op_tb_equad, qtwo);
00267 
00268   for (i=0; i<9; i++)
00269     q[i] = qone[i] + qtwo[i];
00270 
00271   // spherical components -2, -1, 0, 1, 2
00272   equadrupole[0] =  0.25*sqrt(7.5/M_PI)*(q[0]-I*(q[1]+q[3])-q[4]);
00273   equadrupole[1] =  0.25*sqrt(7.5/M_PI)*(q[2]+q[6]-I*(q[5]+q[7]));
00274   equadrupole[2] = -0.25*sqrt(5.0/M_PI)*(q[0]+q[4]-2*q[8]);
00275   equadrupole[3] = -0.25*sqrt(7.5/M_PI)*(q[2]+q[6]+I*(q[5]+q[7]));
00276   equadrupole[4] =  0.25*sqrt(7.5/M_PI)*(q[0]+I*(q[1]+q[3])-q[4]);
00277 }

00279 
00280 void writeprojectedEMMultipoles(FILE* fp,
00281                                 const Projection* P,
00282                                 const complex double** emonopole,
00283                                 const complex double** edipole,
00284                                 const complex double** mdipole,
00285                                 const complex double** equadrupole,
00286                                 const Eigenstates* E)
00287 {
00288   int odd=P->odd;
00289   int jmax=P->jmax;
00290 
00291   int p,j,i;
00292 
00293   char prefix[8];
00294 
00295   int* idx;
00296   int ngood;
00297   complex double* norm;
00298   complex double *H, *E0, *M1, *E2;
00299   
00300 
00301   for (p=0; p<=1; p++)
00302     for (j=odd; j<jmax; j=j+2) {
00303       
00304       ngood = E->ngood[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00305 
00306       if (ngood) {
00307 
00308         if(odd) sprintf(prefix, "[%d/2%c]", j, p ? '-' : '+'); 
00309         else    sprintf(prefix, "[%d%c]", j/2, p ? '-' : '+'); 
00310 
00311         idx = E->index[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00312         norm = E->norm[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00313         H = E->v[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00314  
00315         E0 = emonopole[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00316         M1 = mdipole[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00317         E2 = equadrupole[idxpij(jmax,p,j)];
00318 
00319         fprintf(fp, "\n%s N     = ", prefix); 
00320         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00321           fprintf(fp, "   %8.5f", creal(norm[idx[i]]));
00322         fprintf(fp, "\n%s H     = ", prefix); 
00323         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00324           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", hbc*creal(H[idx[i]]));
00325         fprintf(fp, "\n%s mu    = ", prefix); 
00326         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00327           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", 
00328                   sqrt(4.0*M_PI/3.0)*sqrt(1.0*j/(j+2))*
00329                   creal(M1[idx[i]]/norm[idx[i]]));
00330         fprintf(fp, "\n%s Q     = ", prefix); 
00331         for (i=0; i<ngood; i++) 
00332           fprintf(fp, "   %8.3f", 
00333                   sqrt(16.0*M_PI/5.0)*sqrt(1.0*j*(j-1)/((j+3)*(j+2)))*
00334                   creal(E2[idx[i]]/norm[idx[i]]));
00335 
00336         fprintf(fp, "\n");        
00337       }
00338     }
00339 }

00341 
00342 #define SQR(x) ((x)*(x))
00343 
00344 
00345 void writeprojectedtransitions(FILE* fp,
00346                                const Projection* P,
00347                                int rank, int pi,
00348                                const char* label, const char* unit,
00349                                const complex double**** transme,
00350                                const Eigenstates* E)
00351 {
00352   int odd=P->odd;
00353   int jmax=P->jmax;
00354 
00355   int pini, jini, pfin, jfin;
00356   int idxini, idxfin;
00357   int *idxi, *idxf;
00358   int i, f;
00359   double B;
00360 
00361   for (pini=0; pini<=1; pini++)
00362     for (jini=odd; jini<jmax; jini=jini+2) {
00363       pfin = (pini+pi)%2;
00364       for (jfin=abs(jini-rank); jfin<=min(jini+rank,jmax-1); jfin=jfin+2) {
00365 
00366         idxini = idxpij(jmax,pini,jini);
00367         idxfin = idxpij(jmax,pfin,jfin);
00368 
00369         if (E->ngood[idxfin] == 0 || 
00370             E->ngood[idxini] == 0)
00371           continue;
00372 
00373         idxi = E->index[idxini];
00374         idxf = E->index[idxfin];
00375 
00376         if (P->odd) fprintf(fp, "\n\n %s [%d/2%c] <- [%d/2%c] (%s)\n\n",
00377                             label, jfin, pfin ? '-' : '+', 
00378                             jini, pini ? '-' : '+', unit);
00379         else        fprintf(fp, "\n\n %s [%d%c] <- [%d%c] (%s)\n\n",
00380                             label, jfin/2, pfin ? '-' : '+', 
00381                             jini/2, pini ? '-' : '+', unit);
00382 
00383         fprintf(fp, "%14c", ' ');
00384         for (i=0; i<E->ngood[idxini]; i++) 
00385           fprintf(fp, "%10.2f MeV", hbc*creal(E->v[idxini][idxi[i]]));
00386 
00387         for (f=0; f<E->ngood[idxfin]; f++) {
00388           fprintf(fp, "\n%10.2f MeV", hbc*creal(E->v[idxfin][idxf[f]]));
00389           for (i=0; i<E->ngood[idxini]; i++) {
00390             if (rank == 0) {
00391               B = sqrt(jfin+1.0)*
00392                 cabs(transme[idxfin][idxini][idxf[f]][idxi[i]])/
00393                 sqrt(cabs(E->norm[idxfin][idxf[f]]*E->norm[idxini][idxi[i]]));
00394             } else {    
00395               B = (jfin+1.0)/(jini+1.0)*
00396                 SQR(cabs(transme[idxfin][idxini][idxf[f]][idxi[i]]))/
00397                 cabs(E->norm[idxfin][idxf[f]]*E->norm[idxini][idxi[i]]);
00398             }
00399             if (creal(E->v[idxfin][idxf[f]]) < creal(E->v[idxini][idxi[i]]))
00400               fprintf(fp, "%10.3f    ", B);
00401             else
00402               fprintf(fp, "%10.3f *  ", B);
00403           }
00404         }
00405         fprintf(fp, "\n");      
00406       }
00407     }
00408 }

00410 
00411 void writeprojectedtransitionEMMultipoles(FILE* fp,
00412                                           const Projection* P,
00413                                           const complex double**** emonopole,
00414                                           const complex double**** edipole,
00415                                           const complex double**** mdipole,
00416                                           const complex double**** equadrupole,
00417                                           const Eigenstates* E)
00418 {
00419   fprintf(fp, "\n ########### Electric Monopole Transitions\n");
00420   writeprojectedtransitions(fp, P, 0, 0, "M(E0)", "fm^2", emonopole, E);
00421 
00422   fprintf(fp, "\n ########### Electric Dipole Transitions\n");
00423   writeprojectedtransitions(fp, P, 2, 1, "B(E1)", "e^2 fm^2", edipole, E);
00424 
00425   fprintf(fp, "\n ########### Magnetic Dipole Transitions\n");
00426   writeprojectedtransitions(fp, P, 2, 0, "B(M1)", "mu0^2", mdipole, E);
00427 
00428   fprintf(fp, "\n ########### Electric Quadrupole Transitions\n");
00429   writeprojectedtransitions(fp, P, 4, 0, "B(E2)", "e^2 fm^4", equadrupole, E);
00430 
00431 }
